content.raw: I think it happens in [HaptixGUIPlugin::OnResponse](#!/osrf/handsim/src/99c499e1298ba888011f5c50a1b2c75f2cf83c6f/src/HaptixGUIPlugin.cc?at=default#cl-630) in what appears to be unused code. It's requesting `entity_info` for `mpl`, which is the wrong name, fails to parse the message, and then doesn't do anything with it. Can we remove all that code? @jacquelinekay can you confirm?
content.html: I think it happens in HaptixGUIPlugin::OnResponse in what appears to be unused code. It's requesting entity_info for mpl, which is the wrong name, fails to parse the message, and then doesn't do anything with it. Can we remove all that code? @jacquelinekay can you confirm?
